body:
This has to do with setting `NODE_ENV` when we run karma tests. If we change `NODE_ENV=production karma start` to just `karma start`, tests correctly recompile.

I'm not sure where we left off with karma between #918 and #943. I understand the need to run tests against prod, so I'm wondering if we should split the commands into `test:dev`/`test:prod`, where `dev` would watch and `prod` would be a one-shot run.
